name: Winx Club: Quest for the Codex
name_original: Winx Club: Quest for the Codex
description:
Welcome to the magical world of Winx Club where players can explore a wide range of new characters, interactive environments and fun mini games that incorporates the fashion, friendships, and magic of the Winx Club world. Players will be able to enjoy a simple, social and fun game experience that is designed specifically for girls 6-11.

Nintendo DS™ version includes exclusive mini games that utilize the Nintendo DS™ touch screen.
